docs.snippet: Duke’s star guard returned to the lineup Wednesday night after a tripping incident and led the Blue Devils to a rout of Georgia Tech....
docs.lead_paragraph: Duke’s star guard returned to the lineup Wednesday night after a tripping incident and led the Blue Devils to a rout of Georgia Tech.

headline.main: Grayson Allen’s ‘Indefinite’ Suspension Turns Out to Be One Game

docs.snippet: Initial findings suggest the Kurdish PKK militant group was behind a car bombing outside a courthouse in the western Turkish city of Izmir on Thursday which killed two people, provincial governor Erol Ayyildiz said....

docs.snippet: A government-appointed commission urged Italy on Thursday to develop strategies to prevent radicalization, saying that while the country so far has been spared the extremist attacks suffered elsewhere in Europe, current anti-terrorism measures are...
docs.lead_paragraph: A government-appointed commission urged Italy on Thursday to develop strategies to prevent radicalization, saying that while the country so far has been spared the extremist attacks suffered elsewhere in Europe, current anti-terrorism measures are insufficient.

headline.main: Panel: Italy Must Wake Up to Need to Prevent Radicalization
headline.print_headline: Panel: Italy Must Wake Up to Need to Prevent Radicalization
